database_audit_system.label: Database Audit System
database_audit_system.description: Monitors and records all database activities, including queries, modifications, and access attempts, to ensure compliance and detect potential security breaches.

firewall.label: Firewall
firewall.description: A firewall is a network security device that monitors and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic based on predetermined security rules.

web_application_firewall.label: Web Application Firewall
web_application_firewall.description: A web application firewall (WAF) monitors and filters HTTP/HTTPS traffic to protect web applications from common attacks such as SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF.

intrusion_prevention_detection_system.label: Intrusion Prevention Detection System
intrusion_prevention_detection_system.description: Monitors network traffic for malicious activities or policy violations using signature-based or anomaly-based detection methods.

antivirus.label: Antivirus
antivirus.description: Antivirus logs capture malware detection and prevention activities, including signature-based scanning and heuristic analysis for malicious files or processes.

bastion_host.label: Bastion Host
bastion_host.description: A bastion host is a specialized device that serves as a secure gateway for controlling and monitoring access to critical network resources, typically used for privileged access management.

anti_spam_gateway.label: Anti Spam Gateway
anti_spam_gateway.description: Monitors and filters unsolicited emails to prevent spam and phishing attacks from reaching the network.

anti_ddos_system.label: Anti DDoS System
anti_ddos_system.description: Monitors and mitigates Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks by analyzing network traffic patterns and blocking malicious requests in real-time.

nta_traffic.label: Network Traffic Analysis
nta_traffic.description: Network Traffic Analysis (NTA) focuses on monitoring and analyzing network traffic patterns to detect anomalies, intrusions, and potential security threats.

edr_system.label: Endpoint Detection And Response System
edr_system.description: Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) system logs capture detailed telemetry data from endpoints, including process execution, file modifications, and network connections, to detect and respond to potential threats.

honeypot_system.label: Honeypot System
honeypot_system.description: A honeypot system designed to detect and analyze unauthorized access attempts by mimicking vulnerable devices or services.

vpn_system.label: VPN System
vpn_system.description: Monitors and analyzes VPN system activities, including connection attempts, authentication logs, and traffic patterns for security assessment.

network_dlp_system.label: Network DLP System
network_dlp_system.description: The network_dlp_system monitors and controls sensitive data transfers across the network to prevent unauthorized exfiltration or leakage.

endpoint_dlp_system.label: Endpoint DLP System
endpoint_dlp_system.description: Endpoint DLP system logs capture data leakage prevention activities and policy violations on endpoint devices, including file transfers, unauthorized access attempts, and sensitive data handling.

api_risk_monitoring_system.label: API Risk Monitoring System
api_risk_monitoring_system.description: The API risk monitoring system detects and analyzes potential security threats and vulnerabilities in API communications and transactions.

vulnerability_scanner.label: Vulnerability Scanner
vulnerability_scanner.description: A vulnerability scanner is a security tool designed to detect and assess vulnerabilities in network devices, systems, and applications.

zero_trust.label: Zero Trust
zero_trust.description: Zero Trust security model continuously verifies device identity and compliance before granting access to network resources.
